channel.title: Detonation 742 / Deathtouched darts / Donatorzone / Donatorboss / NEED STAFF! /
channel.description:
[b]SERVER IS CURRENTLY WORKING WITH HAMACHI! [/b][b]WE ARE GETTING VPS WHEN WE GET BIGGER PLAYERBASE!!![/b] [b]JOIN US! WE SERIOUSLY NEED STAFF!![/b] [b](join one of these on Hamachi: detonate1,detonate2,detonate3 and so on...) (pass for all: 123)[/b]
- Looking for staff!
- All skills working!
- All bosses working!
- Working curses!
- Fully working slayer!
- Awesome staff!
- Fully working queen black dragon!
- Donator boss!
- Donator zone!
- Fully working squeal of fortune!
- Working deathtouched darts!
- Working completionist cape and hood!
- Perfect combat!
- Good amount of minigames!
Some Screenshots:
Donatorzone: https://gyazo.com/babe1809903002aaa776af825a5c649d Donatorboss: https://gyazo.com/1a0b4582f65c20db529066d27aef72c7 Donator shop: https://gyazo.com/0670c8b5a6b4e75b64361b2bb2857bff Extreme donator shop: https://gyazo.com/6eaeee0e54b7f5114a3f74c63ef8c4f9 Donator cape: https://gyazo.com/bb516f482479730a939ca2af7cbc354d QBD: https://gyazo.com/8d144fcea79f5380410b5f7c825aca92 Completionist cape / hood customise: https://gyazo.com/964a243536858bf13dff5cd19d55a803 Zombies minigame: https://gyazo.com/4424a21e62979c8a12b95e976f89e044 Squeal of fortune: https://gyazo.com/952140f954012cc01a73787bb292a11a
Forums: http://detonationrsps.proboards.com/
Hamachi: https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/download.aspx
Client: https://www.dropbox.com/s/zxjl5z7gbvd3gne/Detonation.jar?dl=0

item.title: Detonation 742 / Deathtouched darts / Donatorzone / Donatorboss / NEED STAFF! /
item.dc:creator: @Detonation718 Detonation718
item.description:
@Detonation718 wrote:

VyrescapeIV:

This needs tons of work, I see nothing of interest here. + nobody’s going to connect via hamachi.

‘‘Tons of work’’ ? Tell me whats wrong with this server, and ill make sure i will work with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Detonation 742 / Deathtouched darts / Donatorzone / Donatorboss / NEED STAFF! /
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“Detonation718, post:3, topic:554056”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=672979.msg4500322#msg4500322 date=1449685061]
Hamachi, is this 2008?
[/quote]

Its pretty much about the money, not really worth it to buy VPS when we have no players at the moment. Server is still online alot eventho we dont have VPS yet… And like i said, we will get VPS when we gain players.[/quote]

Understandable, but you won’t get players with Hamachi. You’ll never even begin to establish. Refer @ TimeRS3

Read full topic

item.title: Detonation 742 / Deathtouched darts / Donatorzone / Donatorboss / NEED STAFF! /
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

[quote=“Detonation718, post:3, topic:554056”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=672979.msg4500322#msg4500322 date=1449685061]
Hamachi, is this 2008?
[/quote]

Its pretty much about the money, not really worth it to buy VPS when we have no players at the moment. Server is still online alot eventho we dont have VPS yet… And like i said, we will get VPS when we gain players.[/quote]

instead of hamachi use the google Developer Console ?
You can host a server for 60 days on a free trial with an average VPS 2gb
gives you plenty of time to create a good player base, and get your shit together

Read full topic
